title: Baby Grinch's Mischief Whistle
summaries: The Baby Grinch's Mischief Whistle is a pet-summoning item which summons a pet Baby Grinch that follows the player around. When the player is far enough away, a balloon will carry the Baby Grinch to catch up with the player. It is dropped by the Ice Queen during the later waves of the Frost Moon event.

statistics.Sell: 2
